name: The lost princess
description:
You're a lost   princess trying to find your way back home,  you must collect the correct key and pass it on to the chest before moving on to the next level.

The purpose of the game is to speedrun, jumping is not easy and is meant to be hard. There are shortcuts to be discovered that may not seem possible but are possible with precision :)

Map assests by:  piposchpatz

Made by: Frosty and Kian
